sentences.en: All agencies that provoke change and all that retard it can be discribed as'good'or'bad'respectively.
sentences.cn: 一切促进变化和一切妨碍变化的力量都可以分别称为 “ 好”的或 “ 坏 ” 的.

sentences.en: Cold weather retards the growth of many plants.
sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气使许多植物生长滞缓。

sentences.en: Continuing violence will retard negotiations over the country's future.
sentences.cn: 持续不断的暴力活动会阻碍关于国家未来的谈判的进行。

sentences.en: Foam can retard gas channeling and gravity override in gas flooding.
sentences.cn: 泡沫剂可以减缓气驱中的气窜和重力超覆现象.

sentences.en: I was &B{in retard of} them in real knowledge.
sentences.cn: 我在实际知识方面落后于他们。

sentences.en: It's the laughing gas. It make your reflexes retard.
sentences.cn: 是笑气(用作麻醉剂), 延缓你的反映.

sentences.en: Lack of sunlight will retard the growth of most plants.
sentences.cn: 缺乏阳光会妨碍大多数植物的生长.

sentences.en: Numerous and extensive eddy cavities retard the turbulent mixing process.
sentences.cn: 多而大的涡流区延迟了扰动的混合过程.

sentences.en: Objuration from his beloved makes his blooming love to retard.
sentences.cn: 来自挚爱的责难让他刚萌芽的情感渐渐消退.

sentences.en: Pigments that retard to the corrosion in the substrate.
sentences.cn: 能够延缓基材腐蚀的一种颜料.

sentences.en: Please sexist in eagerr resume dawn eagerr appliunusualion retard.
sentences.cn: 请缴送提交请求表格时一并附上履历表.

sentences.en: The brain damage will retard the child's language development.
sentences.cn: 大脑损伤会阻碍儿童的语言发育.

sentences.en: This fact shows that MTBE and ethanol retard the oxidation of alkanes.
sentences.cn: 这表明,在燃烧的起始阶段,MTBE、乙醇有抑制烷烃燃烧的作用.

sentences.en: This type of packaged should help retard flavor deterioration.
sentences.cn: 这种包装有助于保持咖啡豆的良好风味.

sentences.en: Thus, a stable and comfortable environment may retard a person's creative thinking.
sentences.cn: 而人的创意思维也紧跟环境安逸减退下来.

sentences.en: Which is a bit much for a full - time retard like myself.
sentences.cn: 对我这个慢半拍的人有点过分了.

sentences.en: Woods on a slope below an orchard may retard movement of cold air downward.
sentences.cn: 如坡地果园的下方有森林容易阻碍冷空气向下排出.

sentences.en: Writing may retard the process of language change under certain conditions.
sentences.cn: 在某些情况下,文字可能延缓语言的变化.

words.tran_cn: 智力迟钝的；发展迟缓的

trans.tran_en: to delay the development of something, or to make something happen more slowly than expected
